story: Mai Omar Desouki shared her event to the group: Egyptian Geeks.

28.name: Kick-off meeting for Sharing The Point in Africa is coming Dubai

name: Kick-off meeting for Sharing The Point in Africa is coming Dubai
caption: Kick-off meeting for Sharing The Point in Africa is coming Dubai
description:
I am very excited to announce the kick-off meeting for "Share The Point in Africa" event is coming to Dubai... 

Speakers:
Joel Oleson,
Michael Noel,
Mark Miller,
Eric Harlan,
Paul J. Swider,
John Anderson.


Exact Location:
In front of the Dancing Fountain at Dubai Mall.

Call: 00971551663033 to find out which exact place we will have dinner but it is around the fountain so you just reach there and call.

Once settled will update the event page here.
